extendedInfo.description: The only app with up-to-the-minute bus times and route maps for every stop in the UK! From the makers of the country's best-selling travel app comes UK Bus Checker; an app that works at every one of mainland UK's 300,000 bus stops to show you WHEN the buses are coming - and WHERE they're going. Key Features: â¢ Get Live or scheduled bus times for every stop in the UK. â â¢ Browse detailed and comprehensive bus route maps. â â¢ Real-time information in more than 35 towns/cities â â¢ Android widget - live bus times on your home screen â â¢ Save your favourite bus stops for instant bus times â â¢ Search full UK database of 1.2 million roads, postcodes, towns & cities â â¢ Tap on bus numbers to filter the list: see screenshots. â¢ Many other unique features, all with the same slick interface that made our app 'London Bus Checker' a #1 hit. â â London Bus Checker has been featured on BBC Click, Telegraph Online, The Independent, The Guardian, Wired UK and an App Store 'Staff Favourites' ! â ââ FULL DESCRIPTION ââ Using GPS receivers placed on buses as they travel around, UK Bus Checker is able to provide accurate, real-time bus arrivals information in dozens of towns and cities around the UK. (see www.buschecker.com for full coverage list) And if live data isn't available, Bus Checker is able to display an up-to-the-minute list of scheduled bus arrivals; the best of both worlds! And that's not all - Bus Checker is the first and only app in the UK to provide full bus route maps; ideal for planning a journey around town.   Bus Checker includes these and many more features, along with the great interface that's made its sister app - London Bus Checker - the nation's best selling travel app: ââ PRAISE FOR 'LONDON BUS CHECKER' ââ âIf you regularly ride a bus, then you should not leave home without Buscheckerâ â The Guardian âA simple, well-designed appâ â Daily Telegraph âI'm not surprised this app has leapt to the top of the UK Travel chartsâ â BBC Click One of Cosmopolitan Magazine's featured "Best Apps Ever" - Cosmo UK âââ INTRODUCTORY SPECIAL PRICE FOR SUMMER 2013! âââ Download UK Bus Checker today - and never miss that last bus of the night again! Although if you do, we're not shouting you a cab. _____________________________________________ Data provided by official TfL and Traveline feeds _____________________________________________ ââ NOTES ââ - For full list of live coverage areas, see www.buschecker.com - Bus Route Maps use precise locations for bus stops, but the blue line representing roads travelled between them is generated automatically and may occasionally deviate from the actual route taken. As the routing technology improves, your app will update automatically, free of charge. PROBLEMS WITH THE APP? We offer a full support service at www.buschecker.com - and be sure to try uninstalling and re-installing the app too as this cures most general issues with the app. Please do contact us before leaving a bad review - we're here to help!

reviews.title: Could be more optimised for tablets
reviews.comment: Very good app. Helps me tremendously during my daily commute. Shame it doesn\'t look goods on tablets.
reviews.author: Bettina Agwa

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Superb app which has better data than going to one of the normal bus sites. Has routes, bus stops and times which makes planning a trip far more convenient. Is also well optimised for tablets and phones alike.
reviews.author: Paul Keelan

reviews.title: Bug crashes app on opening
reviews.comment: I\'ve submitted bug reports using the in-built bug reporter in Android many times. There is a bug which crashes the app after opening it sometimes when it has been closed using the home button. You have to reopen the app. This may not sound like much, but it is very annoying and means it takes longer to find out the bus times.
reviews.author: Jack Fifield

reviews.title: Good but needs improvements
reviews.comment: Needs improvements such as changing the name of a stop to something like \"home\" and also a journey planner would be nice.
reviews.author: William Allen

reviews.title: Developer to fix paid app.
reviews.comment: The trial works well and I willingly paid for the upgrade, at which time it stopped working.  Reports are ignored, so I wasted my money.  But I found another app.  Developers need to wake up fix the problem.
reviews.author: Dee Trubshaw

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: I love this app and the way it keeps updating every few seconds. The display is excellent and the lay out easy to read and see the times of the next bus due is due. I cannot find a fault at all .
reviews.author: Jonathan Davison

reviews.title: bad!
reviews.comment: bus loading time is extremely slow, app crashes on start up. navigating through bus stops in the map very glitchy!
reviews.author: Shahin Shariat

reviews.title: Essential app for my daily commute
reviews.comment: I\'ve used this application for over a year now and would find it very difficult to go without.   The widget is very handy as there\'s no need to enter into the application to view how much time I\'ve got left to get to the bus stop for my daily journey to the station.   It\'s reliable as well. Absolute must app for those using buses as part of daily commute.
reviews.author: Zee Ramdiane

reviews.title: No where near as good as it was...
reviews.comment: or as easy to use.   I\'ve found the times to be a bit erratic since the last update.   Icon sux too.   Ho hum.
reviews.author: Robb Crafer

reviews.title: Love this
reviews.comment: The seasoned traveller might know every route in their vicinity, but I certainly don\'t. This app makes me an instant expert. Well executed interface, easy to use. No faults from me.
reviews.author: Duncan Innes

reviews.title: Very useful
reviews.comment: Very useful and accurate app, ideal when using the public bus network. I would like to see a route planner incorporated in the app which would make it even better.
reviews.author: Adrian Telford

reviews.title: A real Power Tool
reviews.comment: If you used this app just once in a year, you\'d be impressed! This is the sort of info I bought a smartphone for - awesome!
reviews.author: John Grassick

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Works well, some stops give timetable but says service doesnt stop there, works well where I live and work just need to try elsewhere in UK
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really good app
reviews.comment: It\'s a really good app. Only improvement that it needs is a little travel planner.
reviews.author: Sebastian Bersch

reviews.title: Rated
reviews.comment: Useful app Google now does the same thing needs live bus checker to work properly. After e-mailing to report a problem it was sorted quickly live bus times are working.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Use your bus pass
reviews.comment: This is a brilliant app for anyone with a bus pass who likes to walk I can now take the bus to one village and walk to another knowing when and where to catch a bus home.
reviews.author: Thomas Tomlinson

reviews.title: Best avaliable!
reviews.comment: Great app, the widgets are fantastic. One feature I would like is the ability to rename favorite bus stops so the title is relevant to my journey, however it\'s still the best one I\'ve used.
reviews.author: Gregg Kowbasa

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: If you use buses a lot this is a must buy. 5 stars
reviews.author: Kev Brown

reviews.title: Good App - great on a Tablet...
reviews.comment: I recently adopted this app in preference Scout Bus which had a problem with in-app purchases on my Phone. This app is a much richer user experience  - icons, graphics, etc. - than Bus Scout but, I miss one or two attribute that Bus Scout has: Google\'s Street View and Satellite view of maps...
reviews.author: John Devane

reviews.title: Surprisingly accurate
reviews.comment: Considering this app covers all of the UK, it is surprisingly accurate. It even picked up a schedule change before the new timetable was put up at the bus stop.
reviews.author: Munir Remahl
